com.mesosphere.sdk.framework

Class OfferQueue

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.mesosphere.sdk.framework.OfferQueue

  • public class OfferQueue
extends java.lang.Object
    This class acts as a buffer of Offers from Mesos. By default it holds a maximum of 100 Offers.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      OfferQueue() 
      OfferQueue(int capacity)
      Creates a new queue with the provided capacity.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      (package private) int getRemainingCapacity()
      This method returns the remaining capacity in the queue.
      (package private) int getSize()
      This method returns the number of elements in the queue.
      boolean isEmpty()
      This method specifies whether any offers are in the queue.
      boolean offer(Protos.Offer offer)
      This method enqueues an Offer from Mesos if there is capacity.
      void remove(Protos.OfferID offerID)
      This method removes an offer from the queue based on its OfferID.
      java.util.List<Protos.Offer> takeAll(java.time.Duration duration)
      Calling this method will wait for Offers for the provided duration.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • OfferQueue

        public OfferQueue()

      • OfferQueue

        public OfferQueue(int capacity)
        Creates a new queue with the provided capacity.
        Parameters:
        capacity - the maximum size of the queue, or zero for unlimited queue size

    • Method Detail

      • takeAll

        public java.util.List<Protos.Offer> takeAll(java.time.Duration duration)
        Calling this method will wait for Offers for the provided duration. It returns all Offers currently in the queue if any are present, or an empty list if none appear in the provided duration.

      • offer

        public boolean offer(Protos.Offer offer)
        This method enqueues an Offer from Mesos if there is capacity. If there is not capacity the Offer is not added to the queue and false is returned.
        Returns:
        true if the Offer was successfully put in the queue, false otherwise

      • remove

        public void remove(Protos.OfferID offerID)
        This method removes an offer from the queue based on its OfferID.

      • isEmpty

        public boolean isEmpty()
        This method specifies whether any offers are in the queue.

      • getSize

        int getSize()
        This method returns the number of elements in the queue.

      • getRemainingCapacity

        int getRemainingCapacity()
        This method returns the remaining capacity in the queue.
